backend/main.mo: Defines core data models for users, documents, margin, collateral, trades, deadlines, and audit structures within the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their functionality and purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file that loads the React application and initializes the root container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing, auth gating, and layout structure using TanStack Router and profile setup logic.
frontend/src/auth/permissions.ts: Defines capability-based permission mappings for all business roles and utilities for permission checks.
frontend/src/auth/roles.ts: Defines valid business roles and normalizes extended role strings to these role types.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserManage: User management page gated by manage_users capability, showing navigation, basic layout, and an empty state.
frontend/src/components/auth/PermissionG: Renders children only if the user has a required capability, optionally disabling instead of hiding.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: A dialog for collecting and submitting user profile details such as name, email, department, and role.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Displays a sign-in card using Internet Identity with status handling and basic error messaging.
frontend/src/components/bulk-upload/Bulk: Handles file selection, parsing, validation, sample download, and import workflow for bulk uploads.
frontend/src/components/bulk-upload/bulk: Defines shared types for bulk upload, including config and import summary structures.
frontend/src/components/calendar/AddDead: Dialog for creating a new regulatory deadline with title, description, date, and category.
frontend/src/components/calendar/Deadlin: Groups deadlines by month and displays them in a calendar-style list with status and overdue indicators.
Displays deadlines in a sortable table with status indicators and an action to mark items submitted.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientsT: Displays a scrollable table of clients showing name, PAN, address, document count, and creation date.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientUp: Modal form for creating or editing a client with PAN validation and submission via useCreateClient.
frontend/src/components/common/BackendEr: Renders an error banner with special handling for authentication or permission errors.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: Shows an empty-state card with optional illustration, description, and action slot.
frontend/src/components/margin/Collatera: Displays collateral records in a table with client ID, security details, quantities, and dates.
frontend/src/components/reconciliation/R: Lists reconciliation runs sorted by upload date with status, metadata, and a view-details action.
frontend/src/components/reconciliation/S: Dialog showing up to 100 statement rows for a reconciliation run with amounts and balances.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportTe: Grid of report templates with metadata and a button to select a template.
frontend/src/features/bulk-upload/client: Validates and converts CSV client rows into BulkClient objects, checking required fields and PAN format.
frontend/src/features/bulk-upload/collat: Validates and converts collateral upload rows into CollateralRecord objects with numeric and date checks.
frontend/src/features/bulk-upload/margin: Validates parsed margin snapshot rows and converts them to MarginSnapshot objects, collecting row-level errors. Exposes required columns and a bulk validation/conversion function.
frontend/src/features/bulk-upload/reconc: Validates parsed statement rows and converts them to StatementRow objects with error aggregation. Defines required columns and a bulk import handler.
frontend/src/features/reports/reportTemp: Maps report template IDs to required data sources and transforms backend entities into row-level report data. Supports client, trade, margin, compliance, and reconciliation report types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on identity change. Handles admin token initialization and actor lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's profile using the actor and exposes loading and refetch helpers. Depends on actor readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides login, logout, and identity management via Internet Identity, restoring identity on load and exposing status flags. Wraps AuthClient creation and context handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePermissions.ts: Computes the user's business role and exposes capability checks and visible modules. Uses current user profile to derive permissions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on clients, documents, trades, snapshots, deadlines, reports, and user profiles. Integrates actor-based backend calls with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based theme defining light/dark palettes, status colors, and utility styles for tables and badges. Applies global variables and typography for financial UI.
frontend/src/layout/DashboardLayout.tsx: Defines the main dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, user menu, and permission-based visible modules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
Shows searchable, exportable audit logs with permissions and backend error handling.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientManagem: Manages client records with search, CRUD modals, tabs, and CSV bulk upload processing.
frontend/src/pages/compliance/Regulatory: Page showing regulatory deadlines with list and calendar views, supporting add-dialog and permission checks.
frontend/src/pages/config/ConfigurationH: Configuration landing page displaying navigation cards for exchanges, users, and integrations, gated by permissions.
frontend/src/pages/config/ExchangeSettin: Exchange settings page with a placeholder empty state and navigation back to the config home, permission-protected.
frontend/src/pages/config/IntegrationsPa: Integrations settings page showing a notice and an empty-state card for configuring external systems, behind permission control.
frontend/src/pages/data-entry/components: Manual trade entry form that validates input, displays errors, and stores entered trades locally for review.
frontend/src/pages/data-entry/tradeImpor: Validation utilities defining trade entry types and rules for checking required fields, formats, and allowed values.
CSV parsing helper that validates file type and uses a shared parser to convert trade files into row objects.
Validates parsed trade rows, checks required fields, converts rows to Trade objects, and returns errors if validation fails.
frontend/src/pages/data-entry/TradeImpor: Trade import workflow supporting CSV upload, validation, import, sample download, and history viewing with permission checks.
frontend/src/pages/HowToUseGuidePage.tsx: Renders a scrollable help guide explaining platform usage, roles, and onboarding steps.
frontend/src/pages/margin/MarginCollater: Page for uploading and viewing margin snapshots and collateral records with validation, permissions, and tabbed UI.
frontend/src/pages/OverviewPage.tsx: Displays dashboard metrics, a quick-start guide link, and permission-aware key statistics.
frontend/src/pages/reconciliation/BankRe: Handles bank statement bulk upload, displays reconciliation runs, and allows viewing statement rows with permissions.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ReportLibrary: Displays searchable list of report templates with navigation to generation or scheduling functions.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ReportWizardP: Guides users through selecting a report template, validating necessary data, and generating downloadable reports.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ScheduledRepo: Shows scheduled report configurations and provides actions to create new automated report schedules.
frontend/src/pages/surveillance/Surveill: Renders the surveillance alerts dashboard with summary cards and tabbed empty states for different alert categories.
frontend/src/utils/backendError.ts: Normalizes backend errors into user-friendly messages and logs technical details, with special handling for schema-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/bulkUploadFileParsing: Parses CSV files into row objects with header mapping and basic validation, and rejects unsupported file types.
Provides reusable validators for required columns, empty fields, numbers, patterns, and dates in bulk-uploaded CSV rows.
frontend/src/utils/export.ts: Exports arrays or objects to downloadable CSV or JSON files using Blob-based downloads.
frontend/src/utils/sampleDownloads.ts: Safely downloads sample CSV files and blocks accidental HTML fallback responses before triggering a file download.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/validation/pan.ts: Validates PAN numbers using a predefined regex pattern.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata listing issues and existing features for margin upload visibility and DOM ID collision fixes.
